{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6428n |revision=S v3 (V1.0A) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_date=03/16/2015 |fcc_id=NDD9564281409 |type=wireless router, access point, range extender |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196E |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6KH-6-ND |expansion_if_types=none |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.30.9; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=edimax.setup |default_ssid_regex=^edimax.setup$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|5-in-1 N300 Wi-Fi Router, Access Point, Range Extender, Wi-Fi Bridge & WISP}} :[https://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/wireless_routers_n300/br-6428ns_v3/ Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.edimax.com/edimax/mw/cufiles/files/download/datasheet/BR-6428nS_V3_Datasheet_English.pdf Datasheet]
